channel.title: New Project. Hiring coders, testers , Staff [ NEED HELP}
channel.description:
[SIZE=5]Hello! my name is Jeppe, and i need help to start my project here, so i would like you to join me and test with me, help me code
I AM HIRING CODER STAFF WEBSIDE DESIGNER AND A CO OWNER[/SIZE]
PLEASE TAKE CONTACT TO ME - SKYPE jeppeodk MSN [email]gamingprofile@live.dk[/email][/COLOR]
[SIZE=5]some items i hope we can add 100% donor point system with website, ingame ::claim and vote DONOR TICKETS to purchase items "just the way the system works in Foreverpkers" and All the new weapons such as GS, KORASI, CLAWS; ANCHOR, SS STAFF OF LIGHT POLYPORE HELP TO SET UP ON VPS CONFIG / MYSQL INTREGRATION
100% donor point system with website, ingame ::claim and vote DONOR TICKETS to purchase items "just the way the system works in Foreverpkers" and All the new weapons such as GS, KORASI, CLAWS; ANCHOR, : SS STAFF OF LIGHT POLYPORE VESTA, CHAOTICS , STATIUS, HANDCANNON, ZURIEl[/SIZE]

item.title: New Project. Hiring coders, testers , Staff [ NEED HELP}
item.dc:creator: @harrydragao harrydragao
item.description:
@harrydragao wrote:

Hello. My name is Harry. I can delevope the website, advertise the server (a lot), choose the staff, organize* the forums and organize* the game. If you want me to help you in your server please post bellow your Skype or send me an invite saying that is you. (Skype: harry.warfare)
Thanks for your time in reading this.

  • when I say organize I mean for example deal with bans, make posts, etc.

Read full topic
